about_the_game:
Warp into this massive sequel to the hit mobile game Star Command™ and embark upon your most ambitious mission yet: Save the Galaxy, Captain!

Star Command™ Galaxies delivers an immersive starship simulation experience. Hire your crew, explore strange galaxies, upgrade your ship as you repel alien invaders and engage in massive ship battles.

Retro pixel art in a modern 3D isometric game engine. A sci-fi real-time strategy and adventure game. Truly a must-have for any discerning sentient organism looking to expand their digital entertainment library.

Are you ready to take command?

Or learn more at:


Are you ready to take command?





Join now and take command of your very own starship and crew! Our intensive and comprehensive "Ship Captain in a Far Away and Forgotten Sector" course means you can be technically fit for duty... in as little as right now! The transport is ready!

As a Captain in Star Command:

  • YOU command a crew that are required to heed your every beck and call.
  • YOU command your very own starship... owned by us.
  • YOU must carry every Star Command order, for the good of our alliances or trade deals, possibly both.
  • YOU transform a gang of ragtag, uppity recruits into battle-hardened, ice-cold killer cadets.
  • YOU recruit and promote your crew, and also keep them alive, once the mission has been accomplished.
  • YOU retain all responsibility or liability incurred during the acts or acts of your unruly crew during or after your duty.







Customize and upgrade your (our) starship with cutting-edge, sometimes barely tested at-all, weapons and defensive systems. Fight in gigantic spaceship fleet battles. Destroy weak and unarmed enemy vessels. Repel nefarious teleporting invaders. Blow-up ancient derelict spacecraft with unknown treasures because your orders didn't explicitly say NOT to – you are the Captain, the decisions are yours!



Navigate the beauty, wonder and sheer terror of deep space – where even the tiniest decision can mean certain life or death for you and your entire crew. Bribe greedy space pirates, fend off bloodthirsty alien invaders, launch a torpedo blast at unruly traders, even engage in brutally primitive hand-to-hand combat in regrettably avoidable away missions where only one being can survive... all this and more!



Do you have what it takes? I mean, at such a fantastic bargain of [insert price here] – it's clearly a phenomenal deal any intelligent, attractive and discerning consumer would want to purchase now.

Listen Cadet, Star Command isn't just for any old Zagnar or Flagboolonius – you need heart(s), guts, even a tail, but most of all you have to truly want it! And at [insert bolder price] you can finally prove your zeal.

short_description: Take command in the ultimate starship simulator: Star Command Galaxies. Become a Captain, recruit your crew, customize and upgrade your starship, battle alien vessels, teleport to away missions and repel boarding invaders in this real-time strategy simulation adventure from indie studio Warballoon.
